name: 라그나로크 오리진
summary: Ragnarok Origin is a mobile MMORPG developed by Gravity. Players can experience different activities in this game, such as fishing, farming and mining in an authentic world of Ragnarok Origin.
info:
• 中文名: 仙境传说RO：爱如初见
  • 发行: GRAVITY
  • 原作: GRAVITY
  • 别名: Ragnarok Origin
  • 平台: Android
  • 平台: iOS
  • 游戏类型: ARPG
  • 游玩人数: 多人
  • 发行日期: 2020年7月7日
